title: Calculate opportunity costs using PPC graph

content.question: On the basis of the diagram above showing an economy's production possibilities curve for two goods, which of the following statements must be true? The opportunity cost of moving from point P to point R is 10 units of Y. The opportunity cost of moving from point R to point P is 8 units of X. The opportunity cost of moving from point Q to point R is 0 units of Y.

topic.text: 1.2: Opportunity Cost and the Production Possibilities Curve (PPC)

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
